channel.title: PI Drop rates
channel.description:
I don't really understand the drop rates system in PI , I have set a crystal key to drop from a specific NPC at a rate of 50. Is that high or low? or i have to kill 50 of that NPC to drop once?
Thank you :rolleyes:.

item.title: PI Drop rates
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:2, topic:451528”]Okay so the thing is “drop rates” Do not exist in PI. You must create more drops so instead of

#NPC ID 995 200000 CRYSTAL_KEYID 1

DO

#NPC ID 995 200000 Crystalkeyid 1 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000
that way the drop of crystal key is less rare. If you want it 25% drop rate make 3 money drops and 1 crystal key drop.
If you want 50% make 1 money drop and 1 key drop.[/quote]

Okay thanks , thats why i saw 995 ##### on every NPC.
Btw gratz on 200 repp

Read full topic

item.title: PI Drop rates
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Okay so the thing is “drop rates” Do not exist in PI. You must create more drops so instead of

#NPC ID 995 200000 CRYSTAL_KEYID 1

DO

#NPC ID 995 200000 Crystalkeyid 1 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000 995 200000
that way the drop of crystal key is less rare. If you want it 25% drop rate make 3 money drops and 1 crystal key drop.
If you want 50% make 1 money drop and 1 key drop.

Read full topic
